about_the_game:
Decorate Your Aquarium

Create a captivating aquatic environment! In "Ocean Life: Aquarium Simulator," you can customize your aquarium with unique decorations. Add corals, plants, and accessories to make your aquatic park attractive to your visitors. Your decoration choices determine the ambiance and appeal of your park.

Buy New Fish Species

Introduce a variety of fish into your aquarium! Buy new species and watch them interact. Each fish brings its own personality and dynamics to your park. Make fish deliveries and ensure they are well taken care of to attract even more visitors.

Upgrade the Park

Turn your aquatic park into a popular destination! Earn money by attracting visitors and reinvest it to expand and upgrade your facilities. Add new pools, seating for visitors, and other amenities to offer a more comfortable and enjoyable experience.

Take Care of the Wildlife

Ensure your aquatic park remains a safe place for wildlife. Complete rescue missions to free trapped fish and keep your aquariums clean. Use equipment like Jet Skis to reach hard-to-access areas and ensure every creature in your park receives the best possible care.

Wishlist Now

Add "Ocean Life: Aquarium Simulator" to your wishlist on Steam! Get ready to dive into an immersive adventure where you can create, manage, and care for your own aquatic park. Expect exciting challenges and relaxing moments in this unique simulator experience.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64-bit or more recent
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 2 cores / 4 threads @ 2.5Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Transform an abandoned aquarium park into a thriving water attraction! In "Ocean Life: Aquarium Simulator," clean, decorate, and add fish to attract visitors. Dive in for rescue missions, upgrade your park, and build a vibrant ecosystem.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Italian, Japanese
